question:
You have been assigned to give a networking presentation with your colleague from a different office, who you met last year. Write a letter to your colleague. In your letter:
 • Inform your colleague that you will be working together.
 • Provide your initial ideas on the networking presentation.
 • Ask for a time to meet and practice the presentation.
text: I am writing this missive to let you know that I am from Marketing department and my employee id is 1290.My letter is regarding the networking presentation which has been allotted to us by the company and I am glad to know that the office had put us together in the same group.

I hope you have gone through the instructions for our upcoming project.First of all,We need to gather all the vital information regarding our task.Apart from it,we should keep ourselves vacant for one hour after office time as we need to practice a lot to give our best.In the end,we will distribute the topics according to our convenience,which will reduce the burden on a particular person shoulder.

Please suggest some timings,so that we can cope up with the activities that have been assigned to us.I would be free on weekend besides this we can practice during weekdays but I will be available only on alternative days starting from Monday.If possible let's tomorrow for further discussions.
I hope to hear from you soon
